response.job_title: Expert in process safety and operational risk management systems with a focus on sustainability.
response.summary:
Chemical Engineer specialized in Operational Risk, Process Safety Management, and Quality, with a Master's degree of Business Administration and Corporate Social Responsibility. Focus on plant incident investigation, hazard identification, and risk analysis in production processes, planning and executing internal audits in process safety management (PSM), as well as experience in operational change management with a focus on advancing facility safety.
Extensive experience in effective team leadership skills and cultural transformation processes, focused on security. Continuous improvement of the Process Safety Management System (PSM) and based on the guidelines of the Chemical Center for Process Safety (CCPS). Also, with knowledge of GRI regulations, which support an integrated approach to safety, value generation, and business sustainability.
response.skills: Risk Operations, Process Safety Management, Corporate Social Responsibility, Project Management, System Implementations, English, Root Cause, Microsoft Excel, Project Planning, Engineering, Resource Coordination, Sustainability Reporting, Strategic Planning, Process Engineering, Analytical Skills, Problem Solving, Renewable Energy, Teamwork, Time Management, Change Management

profile_positions.description:
Development of corporate standards to ensure effective implementation of the Risk-Based Process Safety Management System (RBPS) or (PSM)
▪Participation in 12 HAZOP studies and 10 quantitative risk analysis (QRA) modeling for chlorine-alkali and sulfonation processes. Tracking the closure of 350 recommendations, with an approved CAPEX of 10MM USD.
▪Implementation operational management of change.
▪Assisted in defining the chemical risk program
▪Designed and implemented a program to minimize primary containment losses, resulting in zero annual events on the road and a 30% reduction in chlorine emissions at the plant.
▪Led investigations of process incidents using the TapRoot® methodology and successfully implemented 280 recommended improvements.
▪Led more than 20 internal audits of the management system, driving continuous improvement across all its components.

company.description:
At ERM, sustainability is our business. As the largest pure-play sustainability consultancy, we partner with the world’s leading organizations, creating innovative solutions to sustainability challenges and unlocking commercial opportunities that meet the needs of today while preserving opportunity for future generations. 

Our clients are at the center of everything we do – whether building business resilience, supporting their transition to a low-carbon future, or enabling progress on environmental, social and governance (ESG) priorities. 

Our diverse team of world-class experts supports clients across the breadth of their organizations to operationalize sustainability, underpinned by our deep technical expertise in addressing  their environmental, health, safety, risk and social issues. We call this capability our “boots to boardroom” approach for its comprehensive service model that allows ERM to develop strategic and technical solutions that advance objectives on the ground or at the executive level. 

Together with the world’s leading organizations, we are shaping a more sustainable future.
